import React, { useState } from "react"; import { ShoppingCart, Pill, X } from "lucide-react"; export function Cart({ cart, onRemove }) { const [isExpanded, setIsExpanded] = useState(true); const total = cart.reduce((sum, item) => sum + Number(item.price) * (item.quantity || 1), 0); return (
setIsExpanded(!isExpanded)}>
